title: Kenya: Pay Cut Threat Over Audits
text:
By Brian Otieno 
Ministries that do not avail their accounts books in time for audit may have their budgets reduced. 
National Assembly Public Accounts Committee chairman Ababu Namwamba on Tuesday said they will recommend to the National Treasury and the National Assembly Budget and Appropriation Committee to cut back budgets of ministries overlooking audits. 
"In future, this committee will be extremely hard on accounting officers that do not take their responsibility seriously," said Namwamba on the sidelines of the meeting to finalise reports of the 2010-11, 2011-12 and 2012-13 financial years in Mombasa. Kenya
